etomica.virial

Class ClusterSumHS

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.virial.ClusterSum
      • etomica.virial.ClusterSumHS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusterAbstract, ClusterWheatley, java.io.Serializable

    public class ClusterSumHS
extends ClusterSum
implements ClusterWheatley
    This class calculates the sum of all biconnected clusters for hard spheres. Configurations are screened, but the value is computed using standard diagrams.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • cliqueCheck

        protected boolean cliqueCheck(int clique,
                              int nfm1)
        Checks to see if the set |clique| is a clique separator. The graph connectivity is described by the fullBondMask array.

      • getCliques

        public int[] getCliques()
        Description copied from interface: ClusterWheatley
        Returns an array containing the clique sets for the configuration passed to checkConfig. The array is filled from the beginning and may contain cruft at the end (use getCliqueCount to know where to stop).
        Specified by:
